column2: Worth the time to take a look.
Beautiful Train Station with a Museum right next door.
Exterior is cool-- interior only on weekends...
Can't wait for the art museum!!
Great that we still have a train!
This town has certainly change over the years
Simple and Nostalgic Link to the Past
We ought to have more like this....!!
Come See Claremont's Old Train Station :)
Not much there just a cool old building
